column4: can you provide a screenshot with chromium visible but no icon for it in the panel? then you can append it to a bug report
It's a fresh install. Chromium is there, but clicking on it opens up a new window
the panel on the left. open windows have a tick near them
it doesn't work for all windows. For example chromium.
that sounds like a bug, it should work

oh it opens a new window, hmm. that's weird as what people usually complain about is the opposite, i.e. that they can't open new windows. i'm not using Unity at the moment, but maybe try right-clicking and see if there is an option to show
i can't receive DCC, please upload it to imageshack.us or your favorite image host
ok
http://img51.imageshack.us/i/screenshotvqv.png/
well it doesn't show up as open. but it should. let me see if i can find an existing bug report about it, otherwise you should file one
I clicked on the ubuntu logo, searched for chrome, then dragged it to the "panel" or whatever that thing is called now and clicked on it to open it.
that sounds correct
maybe you could just try removing it and doing it again, though
good idea
lol, removed it. chromium is open and no icon is in the launcher
i closed chromium and reopened it too
close chromium, add the icon again, then launch chromium and see
i didn't seem to find an existing report on this by the way
ActionParsnip let me try relogging
ok
ActionParsnip it's working now. Must have been a computer fart.
